DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to investigate the bioequivalence of Mylan's topiramate sprinkle 25 mg capsule to Ortho-McNeil's Topamax® Sprinkle 25 mg capsule following a single, oral 25 mg (1 x 25 mg) dose administered under fasting conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Fasting Study of Topiramate Sprinkle Capsules 25 mg and Topamax® Sprinkle Capsules 25 mg
DOC.criteria: healthy, adult subjects, 18 years and older able to swallow medication institutionalized subjects history of any significant disease use of any prescription or OTC medications within 14 days of start of study received any investigational products within 30 days prior to start of study
